products.name: Stereo HeadPhone
products.description: Travel the Star Wars galaxy with these Mandalorian Bluetooth Headphones! The built-in rechargeable battery allows up to 24 hours of continuous playtime, and includes a built-in microphone for talking to friends and family. These also come equipped with parental controlled volume limiters to protect small ears. A bonus detachable 3.5mm audio cable is included so you can connect to any device with a headphone jack. Adjustable headband and padded ear cushions provide maximum comfort and a custom fit. The foldable design is ideal for convenient travel and storage.
